queries.query: What was the total scheduled quantity in Texas during 2023?
How many pipeline companies are in the dataset?
What percentage of transactions have zero scheduled quantities?
How many total records are in the dataset?
What is the maximum scheduled quantity in the dataset?
How has monthly gas flow in Texas changed from 2022 to 2024?
queries.description: Analyze temporal patterns in Texas gas flow over multiple years

queries.query: What are the seasonal patterns in gas consumption across all states?
queries.description: Identify seasonal trends and patterns in gas consumption

queries.query: Which months show the highest pipeline utilization rates?
queries.description: Rank months by utilization and identify peak periods

queries.query: How has the number of zero-quantity transactions changed over time?
queries.description: Track changes in operational patterns over time

queries.query: What is the year-over-year growth rate for gas flows by quarter?
queries.description: Calculate quarterly growth rates and identify trends

queries.query: Which states have the highest total gas flow volumes?
queries.description: Rank states by total pipeline gas volumes

queries.query: How does gas flow distribution vary between Northeast, Southeast, Midwest, and West regions?
queries.description: Compare gas flow patterns across major US regions

queries.query: Which states show the most volatile gas flow patterns?
queries.description: Identify states with highest variability in gas flows

queries.query: What is the average pipeline utilization rate by state?
queries.description: Calculate utilization efficiency across states

queries.query: Which geographic regions have the highest concentration of pipeline delivery points?
queries.description: Analyze pipeline infrastructure distribution

queries.query: Which pipeline companies handle the largest volumes of gas?
queries.description: Rank pipeline companies by total gas volume handled

queries.query: How do different pipeline companies compare in terms of operational efficiency?
queries.description: Compare pipeline companies by utilization rates and operational metrics

queries.query: Which companies show the most consistent gas flow patterns?
queries.description: Analyze variability and consistency across pipeline companies

queries.query: What are the market share distributions among pipeline companies?
queries.description: Calculate market share and concentration metrics

queries.query: Which pipeline companies have the most extensive geographic coverage?
queries.description: Analyze pipeline companies by number of states and locations served

queries.query: What are the most extreme statistical outliers in daily gas flow volumes?
queries.description: Identify extreme deviations using statistical methods (NOT business anomalies)
queries.critical_warning: Statistical outliers may not represent business anomalies

queries.query: Which locations show unusually high variance in their gas flow patterns?
queries.description: Find locations with abnormally high operational volatility
queries.critical_warning: High variance may indicate normal seasonal or operational patterns

queries.query: What time periods show the most unusual gas flow activity across the system?
queries.description: Identify time periods with system-wide unusual activity
queries.critical_warning: Unusual periods may reflect weather, market, or planned maintenance

queries.query: Which pipeline companies exhibit the most irregular operational patterns?
queries.description: Identify companies with non-standard flow patterns
queries.critical_warning: Irregular patterns may reflect different business models or service types

queries.query: What are the most extreme deviations from expected seasonal gas flow patterns?
queries.description: Find data points that deviate most from seasonal baselines
queries.critical_warning: Seasonal deviations may reflect weather events, economic factors, or data quality issues
